revision.text:
{{Wiktionary|cricket}} '''[[Cricket]]''' is a bat-and-ball sport contested by two teams.
'''Cricket''' also commonly refers to: <!--keep to top--> * [[Cricket (insect)]]
'''Cricket(s)''' or '''The Cricket(s)''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Film and television== * [[The Cricket (film)|''The Cricket'' (film)]], a 1980 erotic drama film * [[Crickets (film)|''Crickets'' (film)]], a 2006 Japanese drama film * [[Christine Blair]] or Cricket, a character in ''The Young and the Restless'' * Cricket, a character in ''[[To Have and Have Not (film)|To Have and Have Not]]'' * Cricket, a [[List of It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia characters#Matthew "Rickety Cricket" Mara|character in ''It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'']]
==Literature== *[[Cricket (magazine)|''Cricket'' (magazine)]], an American literary magazine for children *[[The Cricket (magazine)|''The Cricket'' (magazine)]], a 1960s music magazine *"[[ChrzÄ…szcz]]" or "Cricket", a poem by Jan Brzechwa * Cricket, a character in ''[[Fire on the Mountain (1988 novel)|Fire on the Mountain]]''
==Music== * [[The Crickets]], a rock and roll band formed by Buddy Holly * [[Crickets (Dredg video album)|''Crickets'' (Dredg video album)]] * [[Crickets (Joe Nichols album)|''Crickets'' (Joe Nichols album)]] (2013) * "Crickets", a song by [[Drop City Yacht Club]] * "Cricket", a song by The Kinks from ''[[Preservation Act 1]]''
==Vehicles== *[[Cricket (1914 automobile)]], an early American automobile *[[Plymouth Cricket (disambiguation)]], two automobiles *[[Cricket-class coastal destroyer|''Cricket''-class coastal destroyer]], a 1906 class of Royal Navy ships *[[HMS Cricket (1915)|HMS ''Cricket'' (1915)]], an ''Insect''-class gunboat *[[HMS Cricket (shore establishment)|HMS ''Cricket'' (shore establishment)]], a shore establishment in Hampshire commissioned in 1943
== Other uses == * [[Cricket (darts)]], a game using the standard 20-number dartboard * [[Cricket (musical)|''Cricket'' (musical)]], a musical by Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice * [[Cricket (roofing)]], a ridge structure designed to divert water on a roof * [[Cricket (series)|''Cricket'' (series)]], a series of cricket video games * [[Cricket (warning sound)]], an audible warning in the cockpits of commercial aircraft * [[Cricket, North Carolina]] * [[Cricket Wireless]], a subsidiary of Leap Wireless International, a subsidiary of AT&T Inc. * [[Programmable Cricket]], robotic toys * [[Clicker]] or cricket, a noisemaker * Cricket, a variation of the [[float (b-boy move)|float]] breakdancing technique
== See also == *[[Colomban Cri-cri]], a light plane * Cricket House and Cricket Park, in [[Cricket St Thomas]], England *[[HMS Cricket|HMS ''Cricket'']], a list of Royal Navy ships * [[Shturcite]], a Bulgarian band, translated as The Crickets, or an album by them * [[Tettigoniidae]], known as katydids or bush-crickets * {{intitle|cricket}}
{{disambiguation|ship}}
